channel.title: Bouncing Barrels glitch..
channel.description: Right after this map loaded, all the physics props in game started bouncing up and down on the ground like they were on water. Was a pretty funny glitch, wish I couldve gotten a video. Don't have anything more than a few screenshots. [url]https://imgur.com/a/jbaox[/url]
